channel.title: Vpn on krejac's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Vpn on krejac's notes

item.title: Algo
item.description: So I just tried out AlgoVPN by Trail of Bits. It worked a lot better than both my personal VPN and my coporate VPN. Trail of Bits describes Algo as follows: “Algo VPN is a set of Ansible scripts that simplify the setup of a personal IPSEC and Wireguard VPN. It uses the most secure defaults available, works with common cloud providers, and does not require client software on most devices.
